title: Ceiling fans with overhead lighting in Living Room and Bedrooms
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 731 Sq.
Sapphire Bay lies just thirty minutes from downtown Houston and offers spacious apartments, ultramodern amenities, and unparalleled convenience.

Located in charming Baytown, Texas, Sapphire Bay features generously spaced one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans and state-of-the-art home amenities like plank-style wood flooring, large closets, and beautifully oversized terraces.

For recreation and leisure, community amenities are just as enticing and include a lounge pool with in-water tanning deck, outdoor kitchen with grilling stations, expansive dog park with puppy pool, and much more.
Unlike most Baytown apartments, Sapphire Bay also offers both garage and lot parking for over-sized vehicles.
We invite you to relax completely within our luxury apartments in Baytown, TX.
Whether you are searching for suburban charm or an alternative to nearby Houston apartments, discover your new home at Sapphire Bay.

Oversize side-by-side Whirlpool refrigerator with water and ice dispenser, Ceiling fans with overhead lighting in Living Room and Bedrooms, Antique gray plank style wood flooring throughout Living Spaces, Sleek white subway tile backsplash, Large walk-in closets, Cut Berber carpet in Bedrooms, Custom 42" smooth gray kitchen cabinetry, Single basin kitchen sink with goose-neck faucet and sprayer, Grey-Mist granite counter-tops in Kitchen and Bathrooms, Whirlpool Stainless Steel appliances, 2" faux wood blinds
*Please note: an asterisk * denotes that some amenities are only available in select units.

Limited access gated community with remote access, Direct access attached garages in select units, Luxury lounge pool with in-water tanning deck, Business Center with PC and Mac station, 24-hour fully equipped fitness center with top-of-the-line Precor fitness equipment, Private yards on select units, Outdoor kitchen with gas and charcoal grilling stations, Private poolside cabanas, On-Site management, Expansive dog park with puppy pool, Covered parking options*, On-Site 24-hour emergency maintenance, Pet grooming station, Courtyard fire pits with outdoor seating, Clubhouse with large kitchen for entertaining, 24-hour resident package lockers, Private attached and separate garages*, Extended size garages and reserved parking for large vehicles available, 24-hour yoga and spin studio with Fitness On-Demand technology
Cats and Dogs allowed up to 60lbs.
